page.title: 03LOCAL SOCIETIES
page.content: {WOMEN'S INSTITUTE}Meet monthly.They have competitions about sewing, knitting,cooking,photography,gardening and crafts.They take their goods to Devon County Show each year.Outings are arranged to local places of interest. {British Legion (Mens and Womens) } These club members were relatatives or members of the armed forces.They do a lot of work for the disabled and widows.Meetings take place monthly and they have competitions and outings. {WINKLEIGH SINGERS}Group of singers who sing for charity. {BROWNIES }Meet on Mondays. {GUIDES }Meet on Fridays. {VETERAN TRACTOR CLUB }These people meet monthly and are interested in old tractors.They take them to shows. Some are valuable.
